name: C42 Engineering - Out of Business
description:
We've founded C42 Engineering because we believe that there is a need for high quality Ruby and Rails solution providers, offshore.
With over five years of experience delivering projects using agile philosophies across a variety of platforms, we're ideally placed to build beautifully designed and engineered Ruby and Rails applications. Many of the philosophies that the Ruby community embraces - short iterations, deep customer involvement, continuous integration, test driven development - are things we've been doing successfully for years already.
We bring to the table a deep commitment to technology combined with a passion for understanding and helping grow our customer's business.
